channel.title: Miscellany on Matt Jones
channel.description: Recent content in Miscellany on Matt Jones

item.title: links for 2010-09-06
item.description: Iron Curtain Trail - The Iron Curtain Trail - experiencing the history of Europe’s division A 6,800 km cycle track along the length of the former border, combining European culture, history and sustainable tourism.

item.title: Auction Oddities
item.description: Who Would Buy That? - “Auction oddities from all over the web”

item.title: Troopers
item.description: This is just getting silly [watch out: pretty big download].

item.title: Poem Thing
item.description: Cheers to James at infinitemonkeys.co.uk for the poem type thing.

item.title: Post Deletion
item.description: Oopsâ€¦ just accidentally deleted the last two [manually posted] entries now that Blogger is up and running again. The first one was a link to this, and a second one was a link to this.

item.title: Curry Hell
item.description: Last night, I made the mistake of trying one of these. Now I know what George’s grandmother felt like in George’s Marvelous Medicine.

item.title: Strange Dring
item.description: Drinking a can of some strange Japanese energy drink [which I can’t remember the name of], some Pepsi and a cup of tea before going to sleep is a bad idea. I got very little sleep last night.

item.title: Wishlist
item.description: Just in time for the commercial frenzy called Christmas, I’ve started a wishlist.
